title: SRAM Rival eTap AXS drivetrain brings modern wireless shifting to riders of all levels
content:
SRAM Rival eTap AXS is here. Surprise? It didn’t take a crystal ball to figure out what might be next in the eTap AXS pipeline, but it seems like SRAM’s newest road group will be worth the wait. But why add wireless shifting to what’s essentially SRAM’s entry point for performance road and gravel groups? […]

The post SRAM Rival eTap AXS drivetrain brings modern wireless shifting to riders of all levels appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
